pages.text: 減速器使粒子減速以降低能量。這對於在$(l:multiblocks/vaccuum_chambers/containment_chamber)奇異的收容室$(/l)中創造諸如中性反物質之類的東西或只是將粒子能量降低到一定量很有用。

pages.title: 建造
pages.text: Decelerators are built the same as $(l:multiblocks/accelerators/ring_accelerator#construction)synchrotron$(/l). The only notable differences is they can't have synchrotron ports and that anything more than a single RF Cavity serves no purpose.

pages.title: 操作
pages.text: A decelerator functions the same as a  $(l:multiblocks/accelerators/ring_accelerator#operation)synchrotron$(/l). The difference between a synchrotron is the maximum particle energy that can be inputted $(l)Eᵩ=(qB₂R)²/(2m)$() same as a $(l:multiblocks/accelerators/ring_accelerator#max_dipole)synchrotrons$(/l) form max dipole strength

The energy of the output particles is determined by the strength of the redstone signal applied to the controller. A full 15 strength will decelerate down to ~ 0 i.e less than 1 keV. This is required for creating neutral antimatter. For any redstone strength, the energy the decelerator will try to put the particles at is E=Eᵩ(1-Sᵣ/15) where Sᵣ is the redstone signal strength.

For example if we have a decelerator with a max input energy of 2 GeV and we apply a redstone signal of 8, then 2 GeV*(1-8/15)=933.33 MeV. $(br2)$(bold)Note:$() If the inputted particle energy is lower than this targeted energy it will leave the energy unchanged (i.e. it does not increase particle energy).
